#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define lli long long
const int limit = 100000;
 
int main(){
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		int n,k;
		cin>>n>>k;
		string c;
		cin>>c;
		int count=1;
		int ans=0;
		char ch;
		ch=c[0];
		int flag=0;
		for(int i=1;i<(int)c.length();i++)
		{
			if(ch==c[i])
			{
				count++;
			}
			else
			{
				
				ch=c[i];
				if(count>=k)
				{
					flag=1;
					//cout<<"good\n";
				}
				//cout<<"count="<<count<<"\n";
			//	cout<<"c[i]="<<c[i]<<"\n";
				if(count%k==0)
				{
					ans+=(count/k);
				}
				else
				ans+=((count/k)+1);
				count=1;
			//	cout<<ch<<" , "<<ans<<"\n";
			}
		}
		if(count>=k)
			flag=1;
		if(count%k==0)
		{
			ans+=(count/k);
		}
		else
		ans+=((count/k)+1);
		if(flag==1)
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
		else
		cout<<"-1\n";
		
	}	
}
